name: A Best Deer Hunting Reload & Animal Shoot-ing Sniper Game by Range Target-ed Fun Free
name_original: A Best Deer Hunting Reload & Animal Shoot-ing Sniper Game by Range Target-ed Fun Free
description:
New design, new hunting place, new guns!
Aim & Shoot! Hunt deer in the wild world. Have fun!
Tilt the device to aim and Tap to shoot and kill.

•EASY CONTROLS
•Awesome Graphics
•Multiple TARGETS!
•Improve your skills and unlock new hunting place
•Compete against your friends
•Addictive gameplay
•Simple and fun
•It's FREE!!!

Don't miss a single Shot....or you will end up losing the game!
